title: Discovery QRD-035: constraint_relaxation
hypothesis: Hypothesis: Φ(DecoherenceTopology) ⊗ Ψ(NeuromorphicCircuit) exhibits novel properties under constraint_relaxation transformation
core_mechanism: Core mechanism: A deterministic and composable architecture relaxing constraints on Φ(DecoherenceTopology) ⊗ Ψ(NeuromorphicCircuit) enabling breakthrough operational regimes with first-mover advantages through 2 interaction patterns

formulation.pseudocode:
function apply_constraint_relaxation(system):
  return transform(system, Φ(DecoherenceTopology) ⊗ Ψ(NeuromorphicCircuit))
formulation.formal_spec: Formal: Φ(DecoherenceTopology) ⊗ Ψ(NeuromorphicCircuit) → A deterministic and composable architecture relaxing constraints on Φ(DecoherenceTopology) ⊗ Ψ(NeuromorphicCircuit) enabling breakthrough operational regimes with first-mover advantages via constraint_relaxation

industrial_impact.application: Application of constraint_relaxation in production systems
